oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the construction of restricted minimum aberration designs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SUEN, CY
DAS, A
MIDHA, CK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Complementary design
Generalized Hadamard matrix
Optimal moment
Orthogonal array
Supersaturated design
Word length pattern
FRACTIONAL FACTORIAL-DESIGNS
SUPERSATURATED DESIGNS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Deriving a formula, we show that an optimal moment design has the property that each treatment combination appears as equally often as possible. Modifying the definition of minimum aberration to restricted minimum aberration, we show that the word length pattern of a design is proportional to that of its complement. Many restricted minimum aberration designs are constructed. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
